rules.title: How to Play
rules.gameDesc: Among Lies is a social deduction game where one player is secretly the <imposter>Imposter</imposter> while others are <citizen>Citizens</citizen>. The Citizens know a secret word, but the Imposter doesn't!
hintRules: Each player gives a <bold>one-word hint</bold> related to the secret word
Citizens: Give hints that prove you know the word, but don't make it too obvious!
Imposter: Bluff! Try to give a believable hint without knowing the word
rules.discussionDesc: After hints, discuss who you think the Imposter is. Analyze the hints - whose hint seems suspicious or vague?
votingRules: Vote for who you think is the Imposter
The player with the most votes is eliminated
If the Imposter is caught, <citizen>Citizens win!</citizen>
If a Citizen is eliminated, <imposter>Imposter wins!</imposter>
tipsList: Pay attention to who hesitates or gives generic hints
As an Imposter, listen carefully to others' hints for clues
Don't give hints that are too obvious - it might help the Imposter!
